text: Reinhard Tritscher (August 5, 1946 – September 20, 2018) was an Austrian alpine skier. He competed in the 1972 Winter Olympics where he finished 8th in the Giant Slalom. He was born in Ramsau am Dachstein. Tritscher was killed in a climbing accident on September 20, 2018 at the Hoher Dachstein at the age of 72.Reinhard Tritscher ist tot: Ex-Skirennläufer verunglück bei Bergtour ==References== ==Other websites== * sports-reference.com Category:1946 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Olympians for Austria Category:Deaths in sport Category:People from Styria Category:Austrian skiers
title: Reinhard Tritscher
